import React from 'react'; export default function Dashboard({ stocks }) { return (

List of Stocks

{stocks.map((stock) => { const { id, imgURL, name, type, quantity, supplier, inStock } = stock; return (
ID Image Name Type Quantity Supplier In-stock
{id} {name} {type} {quantity} {supplier} {inStock ? "in-stock" : "unavailable"}
); })}
) };
